name: eulogistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a speech, piece of writing, poem, etc. containing great praise, especially for someone who has recently died: He had been eulogistic, poetic, in his praise. Her eulogistic tribute was delivered in a mournful voice. See
eulogy
More examplesFewer examplesHis tone is gently eulogistic, catching the mood of loss. The essay she wrote was biographical and eulogistic.I offered to say a few eulogistic words about our departing colleague.
